# Glossary

## Terms & Definitions

### A
- **API**: Application Programming Interface - Interface for communication with backend
- **Auto-import**: Nuxt feature that automatically imports components/composables

### C
- **Composable**: Reusable function that leverages Vue Composition API
- **Component**: Reusable Vue component (SFC - Single File Component)

### H
- **Hydration**: Process of making server-rendered HTML interactive on client

### L
- **Layout**: Wrapper component for pages providing common structure

### M
- **Middleware**: Function that runs before rendering a page/route

### P
- **Page**: Route-based view component in `pages/` directory
- **Pinia**: Vue state management library
- **Plugin**: Code that runs when Nuxt app initializes

### R
- **Reactive**: Data that triggers UI updates when changed
- **Ref**: Vue reactive reference (`ref()`)

### S
- **SSR**: Server-Side Rendering - Rendering Vue components on server
- **Store**: Pinia store for global state management

### T
- **TypeScript**: Typed superset of JavaScript

---

## Acronyms

- **API**: Application Programming Interface
- **CLI**: Command Line Interface
- **DX**: Developer Experience
- **SFC**: Single File Component
- **SSG**: Static Site Generation
- **SSR**: Server-Side Rendering
- **UX**: User Experience
